title: Early Life
details: Aryan Keluskar was born and raised in Hyderabad, India, where he developed a passion for technology from a young age.
narration: Aryan Keluskar, a native of Hyderabad, India, discovered his love for technology during his formative years.

title: Education
details: Aryan Keluskar pursued a Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science at Arizona State University, where he was part of the Grand Challengers Scholars Program and received the Most Innovative Design award at E2 Camp.
narration: Aryan Keluskar studied Computer Science at Arizona State University, earning accolades for his innovative design work.

image: A person working on a website design
title: Professional Experience
details: Aryan Keluskar worked as a Website Development Intern at RCV Innovations Pvt Ltd in Hyderabad, contributing to the design and development of immersive retail experiences and multi-page responsive websites.
narration: Aryan Keluskar gained valuable experience as a Website Development Intern at RCV Innovations Pvt Ltd, enhancing retail experiences and website design.

image: A group of volunteers working together
title: Volunteering Experience
details: Aryan Keluskar interned at the Youth Empowerment Foundation, where he created educational modules and designed engaging posters for webinars, showcasing his commitment to community service.
narration: Aryan Keluskar dedicated his time to volunteering at the Youth Empowerment Foundation, creating educational content and visually appealing posters for webinars.

image: A person coding on a computer
title: Skills & Interests
details: Aryan Keluskar is proficient in a wide range of software development tools and languages, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git, ReactJS, and more. He also has expertise in graphic design and spoken languages.
narration: Aryan Keluskar possesses a diverse skill set in software development, graphic design, and spoken languages, showcasing his versatility and expertise.

title: Awards & Accomplishments
details: Aryan Keluskar has received several awards, including All India Rank 1 in the 5th IT Quiz, AP Scholar with Honor, and awards for academic excellence in subjects like Chemistry and Computer Science.
narration: Aryan Keluskar has been recognized for his academic achievements, securing top ranks in IT quizzes and receiving prestigious awards for his academic performance.
